description: BRA/08/002 – Management of Federal Extractive Reserves in the Brazilian Amazon

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description:
The main objective of this project is to contribute to the planning and regularization of the Brazilian
Amazon Region, to promote participative administration and the institutional strengthening of local
organizations for the management and production in conservation units of sustainable use.
The project has as specific objetive to demarcate Extractive Reserves areas to assure to traditional
local communities the right of access to land and its natural resources, promoting the socio-economic
organization and sustainable production associated with forest conservation and poverty reduction.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA/08/002 - Manag. of Resex
